title: FARC and continuation of economic imperialism

content.question: The conditions described in the passage are best seen as a continuation of which of the following nineteenth-century developments?

choices.label: Attempts to regulate immigration in developing countries
Increases in agricultural productivity contributing to population growth
The practice of economic imperialism by industrialized states

content.answer: The practice of economic imperialism by industrialized states

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
